  • Constructor Details

    • PassiveAction

      public PassiveAction()

  • Method Details

    • actions

      public static String[] actions(String[] variablePActions)
      Create the String array containing all possible actions available when not in a fight.
      Parameters:
      variablePActions - a String array that contains all actions that are not final (like move actions and chest opening actions)
      Returns:
      a String array containing all the available actions outside a fight
      See Also:
      • invalid @see 
        for changing passive actions

    • notFinalActions

      public static String[] notFinalActions()
      Create a String array that contains all the actions that might not be available to the player depending on their surroundings
      Returns:
      a String array, the content never changes

    • evaluateAvailableActions

      public static String[] evaluateAvailableActions(Hero hero, Wall[] walls, Chest[] chests, Teleport[] teleports, String[] passiveActions)
      Evaluate which passive actions are available depending on the hero's immediate surroundings
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero whose surroundings are checked
      walls - an array of int arrays which contains the location of all walls of the map except the borders.
      chests - a Chest array, mostly used to know where all the chests are in this case
      teleports - a Teleport array, mostly used to know where all the teleports are in this case
      passiveActions - a String array which contains all possibly changing passive actions
      Returns:
      a String array which contains all available changing passive actions

    • executeCommand

      public static boolean executeCommand(String[] command, Hero hero, Wall[] walls, Chest[] chests, Teleport[] teleports, Enemy[] enemies, Boss[] bosses) throws InterruptedException
      Determines which action to execute outside of a fight depending on the command input
      Parameters:
      command - the String array which contains the command entered by the player
      hero - the character controlled by the player
      walls - an array of int arrays which contains the location of all walls of the map except the borders.
      chests - a Chest array containing the informations on all the chest on the map
      teleports - a Teleport array, mostly used to know where all the teleports are in this case
      enemies - a Enemy array containing all hostile living entities that can be attacked by the hero outside of bosses. Used here for the "Show Map" action only.
      bosses - a Boss array containing all hostile bosses entities that can be attacked by the hero. Include known and hidden bosses. Used here for the "Show Map" action only.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
